title: Many crashes lately?
body:
I always play with my friends (usually a premade of 5) and we've been having many crashes lately. 
We're in champ select normally and it says the user "..." has quit. 
Their game exits out on its own and if they reconnect it does as if they dodged. If they dont reconnect then when its their turn they dont lock in cause reconnecting doesnt put them back in champ select


This has been happening in a huge amount lately and we all have about a 15 minutes wait before queuing up even thougj we never dodged on purpose. (It also happens when we're not playing together so it has nothing to do with the premade)

Is there any solution to this?

replies.body: It sounds like what happens is that the client's dropping its connection to the server, which is what's causing the drop from champ select. Does this happen to you as well, or does it only happen to others you play with? The description you gave is an outside perspective, so I'm not sure if this is happening to you specifically. Let me know~

Its happening to all of my friends. Almost everytime we're in champ select one of us crashes

I'd say there's a good chance this is being caused by a brief disconnection from the servers, so working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) would be a good place to start in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
